name: Focus !!!
description:
An entry for the Trijam #191: "Isolated"

Focus !!!

That was a super party! A lot of sacrifices, and fresh slime at will.

You just want to teleport home and have a shower. It should be easy with a simple Uber spell.

But the cleaning brigade is now rumaging all around the dungeon, and with your headache you can't focus properly to cast!

Avoid the distractions and focus until you can teleport home.

---

Game controls

Move your character with arrow keys

Gameplay notes
  • You gain focus with time, if no skelettons are in your surrounding
  • The more skelettons, the more distraction, the less focus
  • If a skeletton is very near,  you lose more focus. And if you bump into one also
  • Walking in a slime strain is a heavy distraction...
  • Use teleports wisely
  • The game is perhaps a bit too easy... you tell me!
Credits
